name: sane
description: Sane aims to be fast, small, and reliable file system watcher.

scripts.test: npm run format && eslint src/ test/ index.js && mocha --bail test/test.js && mocha --bail test/utils-test.js && mocha --bail 'test/watchexec_*-test.js'
